analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika dassanena apahātabba hetuka duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha,
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: nana dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā
